page.title: 07SPORT IN OKEHAMPTON
page.content:
Okehampton Rugby Club was founded in 1884. In 1984/5 they entered the South West Merit Table for the first time in the clubs history and won. During the 84/85 season the club had a new stand erected. The club has 3 senior, 1 colt and also a mini Rugby team. The club captain in the centenary year was D. Harwood and the president E. Hawkins.
Okehampton Golf Club's President is Lt.Col Brown and the Pro. H. Finch. The course par is 67, the record is 63.The course is short and hilly, the 10th hole is the longest at 505yds. and the 12th the shortest at 98yds.
There are also clubs for badminton, squash, swimming, football and judo. The swimming pool committee has been collecting money to roof the heated open-air pool.
